TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeChecksumPragma extends System.CodeDom.CodeDirective

summary.span: 表示程式碼總和檢查碼 Pragma 程式碼實體。

span.span: Represents a code checksum pragma code entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自，而且可以包含在。The class inherits from and can be contained in a . 提供唯一識別來源檔案，包括已產生的檔案。 provides the unique identification of source files, including files that have been generated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別。The following code example shows the use of the class. Public Sub New (fileName As String, checksumAlgorithmId As Guid, checksumData As Byte())
public: CodeChecksumPragma(System::String ^ fileName, Guid checksumAlgorithmId, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ checksumData);

param.name: fileName
param.span: 總和檢查碼檔案的路徑。

span.span: The path to the checksum file.

param.name: checksumAlgorithmId
param.span: ，其識別要使用的總和檢查碼演算法。

span.span: A that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.

param.span: 包含總和檢查碼資料的位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array that contains the checksum data.

summary.span: 使用檔案名稱、表示總和檢查碼演算法的 GUID，以及表示總和檢查碼資料的位元組資料流，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a file name, a GUID representing the checksum algorithm, and a byte stream representing the checksum data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關`checksumAlgorithmId`參數，請參閱屬性。For more information on the `checksumAlgorithmId` parameter, see the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/CS/codedirective.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/VB/codedirective.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid ChecksumAlgorithmId { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 GUID，該 GUID 識別要使用的總和檢查碼演算法。

span.span: Gets or sets a GUID that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.

value.span: ，其識別要使用的總和檢查碼演算法。

span.span: A that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的 MD5 和 SHA1 雜湊演算法。Algorithms are provided for the MD5 and SHA1 hashes. 若要使用的 MD5 雜湊的 GUID 值是 {0x406ea660、 0x64cf、 0x4c82、 0xb6，0xf0、 0x42，0xd4、 0x81，0x72、 0xa7，0x99}。The GUID value to use for the MD5 hash is {0x406ea660, 0x64cf, 0x4c82, 0xb6, 0xf0, 0x42, 0xd4, 0x81, 0x72, 0xa7, 0x99}. 使用 SHA1 雜湊的 guid {0xff1816ec、 0xaa5e、 0x4d10、 0x87，0xf7、 0x6f，方式 0x49、 0x63，0x83、 0x34，0x60}。The GUID to use for the SHA1 hash is {0xff1816ec, 0xaa5e, 0x4d10, 0x87, 0xf7, 0x6f, 0x49, 0x63, 0x83, 0x34, 0x60}. 總和檢查碼計算只是特定語言。The calculation of the checksum is language-specific. 也就是語言廠商可以使用任何偵錯工具已知的雜湊演算法來計算總和檢查碼。That is, the language vendor can use any of the hashing algorithms known to the debugger to calculate the checksum. 這個屬性使用 GUID 提供雜湊演算法的擴充性。The use of a GUID for this property provides hash algorithm extensibility. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的設定屬性。The following code example shows the setting of the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/CS/codedirective.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/VB/codedirective.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ ChecksumData { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定總和檢查碼計算的資料值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the data for the checksum calculation.

value.span: 包含總和檢查碼計算資料的位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array that contains the data for the checksum calculation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含從指定的目標檔案的資料包含屬性。The property contains data from the target file specified by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的設定屬性。The following code example shows the setting of the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class [!code-csharp[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/CS/codedirective.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/VB/codedirective.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定總和檢查碼檔案的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the checksum file.

value.span: 總和檢查碼檔案的路徑。

span.span: The path to the checksum file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 舉例來說，屬性值是"C:\Temp\Test\OuterLinePragma.txt"。An example of a property value is "C:\Temp\Test\OuterLinePragma.txt". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的設定屬性。The following code example shows the setting of the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class [!code-csharp[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/CS/codedirective.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/VB/codedirective.vb#5)]
